import React, { useRef, useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import * as THREE from 'three'; import { OrbitControls } from 'three/examples/jsm/controls/OrbitControls.js'; function Planner() { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); const togglePopup = () => { setIsOpen(!isOpen); }; return (
